articles.title: Cathie Wood Sells More Tesla Stock. Q4 Deliveries Loom But The Market May Not Care.
articles.mainIdea: Cathie Wood Sells More Tesla Stock. Q4 Deliveries Loom But The Market May Not Care.
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Cathie Wood Sells More Tesla Stock. Q4 Deliveries Loom But The Market May Not Care.. Cathie Wood's Ark Invest is shifting money into crypto, even as Tesla stock hits highs on market bets for self-driving, shrugging off deliveries. Related tickers mentioned: TSLA.

articles.title: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.
articles.mainIdea: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Tesla Stock Is Fighting for $500. How It Gets There.. Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on X that Teslaâ€™s robo-taxis were unaffected. Coming into Tuesday trading, Tesla stock was up 21% this year, boosted by a 25% jump over the past month, despite falling EV sales. Recent share gains have left Tesla stock trading for about 225 times estimated 2026 earnings. Related tickers mentioned: ARKQ, TSLA, ^DJI, ^GSPC.

articles.title: Despite Its Recent Dip, Cathie Wood Just Bought $30 Million in This Fintech Giant
articles.mainIdea: Despite Its Recent Dip, Cathie Wood Just Bought $30 Million in This Fintech Giant
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Despite Its Recent Dip, Cathie Wood Just Bought $30 Million in This Fintech Giant. The famed growth investor upped Ark Invest's wager on Robinhood Markets following its recent round of weakness. Related tickers mentioned: HOOD.
